languages.text: "Твоего имени я не спрашиваю. Оно столь же недолговечно в этом мире, как утренняя роса, исчезающая к полудню".

traits.locale_text: "Твоего имени я не спрашиваю. Оно столь же недолговечно в этом мире, как утренняя роса, исчезающая к полудню".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "I will not ask for your name. It is as ephemeral in this world as the morning dew that disappears by noon."
languages.original_text: "Твоего имени я не спрашиваю. Оно столь же недолговечно в этом мире, как утренняя роса, исчезающая к полудню".

traits.locale_text: "I am not asking for you name. It is as ephemeral in this world as the morning due that disappears by noon."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "I am not asking for you name. It is as ephemeral in this world as the morning due that disappears by noon."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "I will not ask for your name. It is as ephemeral in this world as the morning dew that disappears by noon."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "I will not ask for your name. It is as ephemeral in this world as the morning dew that disappears by noon."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "I will not ask for your name. It is as ephemeral in this world as the morning dew that disappears by noon."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Yo no te preguntaré cuál es tu nombre. Es tan efímero en este mundo como el rocío de la mañana que ya se ha evaporado al mediodía».
languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your name. It is as ephemeral in this world as the morning dew that disappears by noon."

traits.locale_text: «Yo no te preguntaré cuál es tu nombre. Es tan efímero en este mundo como el rocío de la mañana que ya se ha evaporado al mediodía».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「お前の名は聞かぬ。この惑星では、昼には消える朝露のように儚いものだからな」
languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your name. It is as ephemeral in this world as the morning dew that disappears by noon."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の名は聞かぬ。この惑星では、昼には消える朝露のように儚いものだからな」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “我就不问你的名字了，因为你的名字只会在这世上存在片刻，正如朝露必定会在正午之前消散。”
languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your name. It is as ephemeral in this world as the morning dew that disappears by noon."

traits.locale_text: “我就不问你的名字了，因为你的名字只会在这世上存在片刻，正如朝露必定会在正午之前消散。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Je ne vous demanderai pas votre nom. Il est aussi éphémère dans ce monde que la rosée qui disparaît à midi. »
languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your name. It is as ephemeral in this world as the morning dew that disappears by noon."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous demanderai pas votre nom. Il est aussi éphémère dans ce monde que la rosée qui disparaît à midi. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Nach Eurem Namen werde ich nicht fragen. Er ist in dieser Welt so vergänglich wie der Morgentau, der zur Mittagsstunde schwindet."
languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your name. It is as ephemeral in this world as the morning dew that disappears by noon."

traits.locale_text: "Nach Eurem Namen werde ich nicht fragen. Er ist in dieser Welt so vergänglich wie der Morgentau, der zur Mittagsstunde schwindet."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Adını sormayacağım. Bu dünyada ad dediğin, öğle vaktine dek yok olan çiy misali gelip geçici bir şey."
languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your name. It is as ephemeral in this world as the morning dew that disappears by noon."

traits.locale_text: "Adını sormayacağım. Bu dünyada ad dediğin, öğle vaktine dek yok olan çiy misali gelip geçici bir şey."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
